_description: The King’s Letter to his Son — five couplets

BLHar7322.First Lines: Sinne & folþe onli forsaketo clennesse of lif for mi loue tacloue god boþe wit herte & þoutfor to his licnesse þou art wrout…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …Come nou my swete chilt wan þou come wiltfor redi is þin heritage & forȝouin is þi gilt
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
